name: Xenomorph
description: X-Fire VR is a Rogue-lite Duck & Cover experience in a futuristic world full of hostile aliens and robots. The game features over 15 different enemy types, massive large levels with just the first mission taking up 1 hour or more to complete. The game features stores, mechs, zombies, aliens, weapon handling, loot boxes, loot drops, xp, leaderboard and much more!
